comment: Technical trick to permit re-use of some equivalence class lemmas for operation laws. The trick involves ~ ecid , which shows that the coset of the converse epsilon relation (which is not an equivalence relation) leaves a set unchanged. See also ~ dfcnqs . _Note: This is the last lemma (from which the axioms will be derived) in_ _the construction of real and complex numbers. The construction starts_ _at_ ~ cnpi . (Contributed by NM, 13-Aug-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)
